Welcome To Crudexchange
"CrudeX gives visibility into market dynamics that ensure the best price for our production."
- Justin Vaughn, CFO Peak Powder River

Producers

Market our production with speed and efficiency. Automate the bid process and easily evaluate buyers on performance, safety, credit, and payment terms. Leverage industry best practices and expertise.

  • Run a competitive auction to uncover new purchasers
  • Determine real market value
  • Keep your current purchaser order
  • Switch haulers and purchasers smoothly
  • Back office analytics on daily hauled volume and revenue

Buyers

Transact at the wellhead with speed and ease. Quickly identify upcoming production and vetted haulers. See market value through live bidding.

  • Discover new production in your area
  • Evaluate volume, quality, decline, and hauling
  • Bid to win - know what it takes

Haulers

Gain exposure to our network of producers and purhcasers. Increase payloads in existing operation areas. Earn credibility for safety and performance.

  • Identify wellhead location and haul distance
  • Know both on-road and off-road miles and road type
  • Competitively bid based on origin and destination

Our Platform

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur.

  • One-Time Setup

    Easily upload excel file with API number, Lease name, Location, BPD, and quality information

    Assign wells to bid package

  • Marketplace

    Select qualified purchasers and evaluate purchaser performance

    Create private market, recieve and evaluate bids

    Negotiate and award production

  • Back Office

    Easily communicate with counterparties back office

    All information warehoused in secure online account

  • Analytics & Reporting

    Track Volumes - Tickets are automatically imported into account

    Volume and revenue reporting

    Regulatory, big history, price history

All bidding, transactions, and data exchange are encrypted with 256-bit encryption.
